mdRecord.dcterms:title: Drama Festival: Aug 1-30
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster announcing the productions comprising the Aug 1-30 Drama Festival: Boy Friend Aug 1-2 | Golden Fleecing Aug 3-4 | Disenchanted Aug 5 | Sleeping Beauty Aug 6 | Fallen Angels Aug 6 | Dark at the Top of the Stairs Aug 8-9 | Two for the Seesaw Aug 10-11 | Regions of Noon Aug 12-13.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Responsibility for any use of these materials rests exclusively with the user.
